meanings.definition: The process of teaching a pet to relieve itself in a designated area.
meanings.sent1: Housetraining is important for pets to learn where to go potty.
meanings.sent2: My puppy is still in the housetraining phase, so accidents happen.
meanings.sent3: During housetraining, my cat thought the whole house was her litter box!
meanings.sent4: Housetraining is like guiding your pet to their own personal bathroom.
meanings.sent5: Successful housetraining requires patience and consistency.
